description: So the sound quality got screwed in the export since I did this in gp6 but this is still the most accurate I have found and could make myself. I slowed the song to half time to get a lot of the intricacies (some I didn't even know about). I mainly focused on the solo, the rest is just what I do to play the song, but it's close. I was going for a 4 star tab when I made this
title: True American Hate
